attributes.action: Introduce a disabled bus pass without travel time restrictions for working age
attributes.additional_details: This should allow more disabled to get into work before 09:30 & travel after 23:00 shift work  , this would enable them more flexibility  & help the welfare bill reduce , I feel a small cost to relieve a bigger cost of welfare  , travelling is one of the biggest issues facing the disabled ,
attributes.background: Free restrictions for working age disabled person in order that they may travel for work , rather than rely on taxis or access to work . The disabled should not be discriminated against & afforded help , full flexibility to fulfill their potential.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for similar action:  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/729326
